com.flappybird.game

Class BoundingBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flappybird.game.AbstractGameObject
      • com.flappybird.game.BoundingBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FlappyBirdConstants, IGameObject

    public class BoundingBox
extends AbstractGameObject
    Represents a BoundingBox, used to bound the coordinates of a 'Button'
